text: 6.13: Ro 7.5; 12.1; Ef 2.5; 5.14; Kor 3.5; Ze 4.1Nde fhura tɨvi mbatɨgi ganɨrim, nta nde hari gu suira, gu nde fhavi nderi ganɨrim, nde tɨvi mbatɨgir muuŋ thari. Nde rimgim, Fhe Bakɨme taagia nde khavgi gumgi gu mbigi fara muuŋgiap wari ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde wari ndiv Fhe Bakɨmen nɨɨŋgiri. Nde wari ndiv Fhe Bakɨmen nɨɨŋgip, fhura ana ganɨrim, ana za nde kɨrɨ tɨvi gu nde fhavi ganɨrim, nde tɨvir vhuuiŋra muuŋri.
